definition: to make into/to change into/-ization/to ... -ize/to transform/abbr. for 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]
lit. to be optimized away/to be fired/to be the victim of downsizing

sentences.english: At the same time, the use of coal exhaustive method to optimize selection.
sentences.chinese: 同時利用窮舉法對配煤進行優化選取。

sentences.english: Multi-cropping optimized and cropping density increased in wave.
sentences.chinese: 作物複種方式不斷優化，複種指數呈波動式增長。

sentences.english: Human Factors is the discipline of optimising human performance in the workplace.
sentences.chinese: 人的因素，是優化人在工作場所的表現紀律。

sentences.english: Bugfix related to optimizing Far-field data including surface-wave.
sentences.chinese: 修正了相關的優化遠場數據，包括地面波。

sentences.english: Dynamic reliability analysis and compare of rail based on random process over-crossing theory;
sentences.chinese: 基於隨機過程理論對物流活動中的庫存管理進行優化。

sentences.english: The finite element analysis (FEA) and the variable density methods were used. The optimization method and process were presented.
sentences.chinese: 採用有限元法與變密度法，給出了優化方法和步驟。

sentences.english: A new kind of modelling was proposed on aircraft wing structural analysis and optimization.
sentences.chinese: 提出一種新的飛機翼面結構分析和優化的建模技術。

sentences.english: Through the research, an optimization program of gas drilling equipment package is formed.
sentences.chinese: 通過研究，形成了一套氣體鑽井裝備配套優化方案。

sentences.english: A mathematical model for optimizing topological design of local-area networks is studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了計算機局域網優化設計問題的數學模型。

sentences.english: Experiments show the proper application of this method can improve the effects of shot-put teaching.
sentences.chinese: 經過實驗研究，合理運用可以優化教學效果。

sentences.english: This paper proposes an optimization design method for multi-channel broadband phase shifter with constant difference step.
sentences.chinese: 提出一種多通道寬帶等差步進移相器的優化設計方法。

sentences.english: The optimization of signal timing is an important way to improve intersection level of service.
sentences.chinese: 信號配時優化是提高平面交叉口服務水平的重要途徑。

sentences.english: Second, it helps you avoid the pitfalls of premature optimization in your migration.
sentences.chinese: 其次，它可以幫助您避免遷移過程中的過早優化陷阱。

sentences.english: Lastly, it discusses the layout of the warehouse and optimization of the goods location.
sentences.chinese: 最後，論述了倉庫的佈局和貨位優化問題。

sentences.english: The test paper generation is a constrained multi-object optimization problem.
sentences.chinese: 組卷問題是一個多約束多目標組合優化問題。

sentences.english: Able to reveal weaknesses in the structure in order to optimize the structure design.
sentences.chinese: 能夠揭示出結構的薄弱環節，以利於優化結構設計。

definition: to push (for acceptance of a plan)/to push forward/to promote/to actuate/CL:個|个[ge4]
one step further/to move forward a step/further onwards
innovation/to bring forth new ideas/to blaze new trails
to oversee/to take charge of/to supervise/to administer/supervisory/supervision
to coordinate/to harmonize/to fit together/to match (colors etc)/harmonious/concerted
to advance/to conduct/underway/in progress/to do/to carry out/to carry on/to execute
